title: feat: allow extracting TLS SNI server name and TLS PSK identity
body:
This change allows to query for the SNI server name and the PSK identity.

The server name implements only the DNS variant, as this is what both APIs currently seem to support.

The PSK identity is only implemented for OpenSSL, as RustTLS currently doesn't support TLS PSK. But it could be implemented the same way, once this becomes available.

title: Fix transported protocol error on ping request
body: Pong response is being encoded as a transported binary message by WS filter

title: Add ?Sized to Rc service
body: Box has ?Sized added on the line 207, but Rc is missing the same. Needed for GW to be able to use a retry service as a wrapper around another service.

title: [BUGFIX] async-std cannot find function block_on on windows
body:
Hey there!
A little bugfix referring to this [issue](https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/issues/115)

Hope it's usefull !

title: Switch to ntex-h2 for http/2 support
impl FromIterator for HeaderMap
body: I don't know if it is useful, but I want to contribute!

title: use MaybeUninit type for header parsing.
body:
use MaybeUninit type for parsing headers and header indices recording.
This would bump MSRV to 1.55 as `MaybeUninit::write` is a safe API stabled at this version. If maintaining current MSRV is important I can make further change and extract the unsafe api under hood.

title: PeerCert and PeerCertChain implementation for rustls
body: Implement PeerCert and PeerCertChain for rustls server and client case.

title: Optimize Millis and Io memory layout
Implement std::error::Error and fix minor issues
body: Errors would be better implemented with `thiserror` instead of `derive_more`. I implement it?

title: add socket options
body:
add ability to change socket options for tokio.

this is useful for niche use cases and for testing (i.e. forcing a tcp reset). setting linger to 0 is special case on unix  to reset connection, but we must elide the call to shutdown in this case.

title: Introduce Sealed type instead of Box<dyn Filter>
Rename .write_ready to .flush
body:
* Rename .poll_write_ready() to .poll_flush()
* Rename .write_ready() to .flush()

title: Replace mio with polling for accept loop
Refactor ntex::time
body:
* move to ntex-util crate
* replace tokio::time with futures-timer

title: Bump rustls to 0.20.x
body: I'm not sure I set alpn_protocols correctly.

title: fix clippy 1.54
body: fix new lints in 1.54 toolchain

title: fix rustls connect
body: Since host() contains name:port, TLS fails with invalid DNS - #50. This hotfix removes the port from the host string.

title: Fix clippy and minor issues
body: Fix nightly clippy  and minors issues

title: Improve performance of DateService set_date_header
body: Avoid double allocation and capacity check

title: Simplify task LocalWaker register method
body: Simplify register waker with `replace` method of mutable pointer

title: Improve bcodec encode performance
body: Remove repeat calls to `reverve` method. Stop treating `item` since it has the assured drop. Add the inline attribute because the resulting body is just one line.

title: Update bytes version to 0.5.6
body: This last version includes some inline optimizations. The [`buf-min::Buffer`](https://docs.rs/buf-min/0.1.1/buf_min/trait.Buffer.html), used at `yarte`,  avoid some functions calls and generate intrinsics more optimizeds.

title: Fix io close
body:
* Fix io close for Framed
* Fix connection shutdown for h1 dispatcher
* Enable client disconnect for http server by default
* Add connection disconnect timeout to framed service

title: Tests coverage
body:
* better error for http payload decoder
* h1 dispatcher tests
